div.a: Homeland Security Spent $430M On Radios Nobody Knows How To Use

div.div: DHS has spent $430 million over the past nine years to provide radios tuned to a common, secure channel to 123,000 employees across the country. Problem is, no one seems to know how to use them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5g3Xz&via=Digg&text=Homeland Security Spent $430M On Radios Nobody Knows How To Use

div.a: Is It Possible To Build A Jetpack Using Machine Guns?

div.div: The principle here is pretty simple. If you fire a bullet forward, the recoil pushes you back. So if you fire downward, the recoil should push you up. But just how far up could it push you?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFmCQf&via=Digg&text=Is It Possible To Build A Jetpack Using Machine Guns?

div.div: 'DO YOU KNOW HOW FABULOUS I'D LOOK?'

div.a: The Fox News Host Who Thinks Food Stamps Are A Fantastic Dieting Tool

div.div: On the eve of Thanksgiving, Fox News pundit Andrea Tantaros mockingly dismissed the plight of hungry Americans, claiming that she would "look fabulous" if she were forced to live on a food stamp diet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10dnaTy&via=Digg&text=The Fox News Host Who Thinks Food Stamps Are A Fantastic Dieting Tool

div.a: In Space, Flames Behave In Ways Nobody Thought Possible

div.div: Recent tests aboard the International Space Station have shown that fire in space can be less predictable and potentially more lethal than it is on Earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S9qlbP&via=Digg&text=In Space, Flames Behave In Ways Nobody Thought Possible

div.a: How To Actually Keep Calm And Carry On

div.div: The British are better at so many things. Throwing weddings, speaking in cool voices and above all, keeping calm. They are really good at not losing it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QYztSp&via=Digg&text=How To Actually Keep Calm And Carry On

div.a: Deep Inside the James Bond Villain Lair That Actually Exists

div.div: That bunker, called Pionen White Mountains is located just south of Stockholm. Nearly 20 years after Sweden's Civil Defense decommissioned it, Karlung converted it into a data center. A few years ago, it was briefly the most famous data center in the planet -- home to WikiLeaks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SafzlF&via=Digg&text=Deep Inside the James Bond Villain Lair That Actually Exists

div.div: WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT KEVIN

div.a: Why Is Our First Instinct To Defend Kevin Clash?

div.div: Of course we don’t “hope” to see our idols become criminals. But hoping that an allegation is false really means that we’re hoping potential victims of sexual assault are liars.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SesBgy&via=Digg&text=Why Is Our First Instinct To Defend Kevin Clash?

div.a: It's Not Just Google Glasses That Will Make Us All Cyborgs

div.div: Google Glass now has a glasses-of-the-future competitor called the Vuzix smart glasses M100, which look about as cyborg-ish as Google's wearable computer invention, giving us pretty much no hope for a non-robotic version of these things, ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WySVqq&via=Digg&text=It's Not Just Google Glasses That Will Make Us All Cyborgs

div.div: IS YOLO AN OFFICIAL WORD YET?

div.a: Inside The Search For 2012's Word Of The Year

div.div: Dictionary.com has announced "bluster" as its 2012 Word of the Year. As far as words of the year go, this is an OK if not too terribly innovative one (sorry, guys), combining patterns weather (Sandy) with patterns political (an election year).

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ST21b5&via=Digg&text=Inside The Search For 2012's Word Of The Year

div.div: While we still have a ways to go before the advent of photon torpedoes and warp drives, Stony Brook University has just brought us one step closer to our Star Trek future with the unveiling of its immersive video projection system, the Reality Deck.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPTMvD&via=Digg&text=The Holodeck Is Real

div.div: ANIMALS ARE JUST TOO HARD TO BELIEVE IN

div.a: Pope's Final Book On Jesus Claims No Animals In Manger, Virgin Birth Was Historical Truth

div.div: Just in time for Christmas, the Vatican on Tuesday unveiled a new book by Pope Benedict XVI focused on Jesus' birth and childhood, the final installment of his trilogy on the life of Jesus.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10bQZUL&via=Digg&text=Pope's Final Book On Jesus Claims No Animals In Manger, Virgin Birth Was Historical Truth

div.a: Flaming Lips' Wayne Coyne Causes Bomb Scare

div.div: Things you still can't get away with even if you're a rock star: carry a grenade through airport security.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ug51QP&via=Digg&text=Flaming Lips' Wayne Coyne Causes Bomb Scare

div.a: The 12 Ugliest Christmas Sweaters On eBay

div.div: Ho ho ho! Is that Santa Claus I hear, or the sound of someone gagging in sweater-induced horror? Hopefully both!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UmplzW&via=Digg&text=The 12 Ugliest Christmas Sweaters On eBay

div.a: An Interactive Survey Of The Flooding In NYC After Sandy

div.div: .@NYTGraphics knocked it out of the park with this map surveying #Sandy storm surge flooding nytimes.com/newsgraphics/2...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10eT16q&via=Digg&text=An Interactive Survey Of The Flooding In NYC After Sandy

div.div: If homosexuals reproduce less than heterosexuals—and they do—then why has natural selection not operated against it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QVbR11&via=Digg&text=The Evolutionary Mystery Of Homosexuality

div.div: THE MOST ELIGIBLE HIRES IN TECHDOM
Corporate America and Silicon Valley are trying to capture some of the Obama campaign's magic by hiring away the very people that made it such a success.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XzfHQb&via=Digg&text=Corporations Want Obama's Winning Formula

div.a: We're Not Afraid To Admit That Sea Tornadoes Are Scary

div.div: Sea tornadoes off the coast of Australia are not new. But this one is particularly striking and huge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S9jnDC&via=Digg&text=We're Not Afraid To Admit That Sea Tornadoes Are Scary

div.a: Rep. Jesse Jackson Jr. Resigns From Congress

div.div: Rep. Jesse Jackson Jr. has resigned from Congress amid mental health issues and a federal investigation into his political dealings.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TgpYMG&via=Digg&text=Rep. Jesse Jackson Jr. Resigns From Congress

div.div: SUBSTITUTE YOUR BOSS FOR YOUR UNCLE

div.a: Americans To Spend Quality Time With Their Coworkers This Holiday Season

div.div: In the United States, holidays are often less about making memories and more about making money.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ug6VRq&via=Digg&text=Americans To Spend Quality Time With Their Coworkers This Holiday Season

div.a: Brawl Breaks Out During City Hall Meeting

div.div: A behind-the-scenes political maneuver by Newark Mayor Cory Booker to fill a vacant council seat with his choice led to a near-riot in city hall, with dozens of residents rushing the council stage and police responding with pepper-spray.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ScWP3l&via=Digg&text=Brawl Breaks Out During City Hall Meeting

div.a: Israel And Hamas Agree To Cease-Fire

div.div: Israel and Hamas agreed to a cease-fire on Wednesday after eight days of lethal fighting over the Gaza Strip, the United States and Egypt said after intensive negotiations in Cairo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QXRFvk&via=Digg&text=Israel And Hamas Agree To Cease-Fire

div.a: The Gestures Required To Beat Every Level Of Angry Birds, Visualized In Paper And Ink

div.div: When you play Angry Birds, at this point it’s likely a completely unconscious, natural gesture; draw back, aim and release. But what if each time you did that, you produced an indelible mark, so that after countless hours spent playing Rovio’s addictive physics flinging mobile game, you had a visual record of your part of the process?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TfotiA&via=Digg&text=The Gestures Required To Beat Every Level Of Angry Birds, Visualized In Paper And Ink

div.div: Twenty miles or so east of Amsterdam, set between the new towns of Almere and Lelystad, and lying five meters below sea-level, is the youngest wilderness on the planet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T9DlMo&via=Digg&text=There's Another Continent

div.div: OUT WITH THE OLD, IN WITH THE NEW

div.a: Departing Members Of Congress Leave With Their Quirks In Tow

div.div: From colorful office décor to what are politely known as personal eccentricities, the expiring 112th Congress has left its mark in ways large, small and somewhat weird.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y11jzm&via=Digg&text=Departing Members Of Congress Leave With Their Quirks In Tow
